src_original: śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda /  pattīyasi /  yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /  atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vātra gambhīre buddhagocare //  athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 我於如來所說契經深義，不生疑惑。
一切如來身、語、意業，皆無虛妄。

src_original: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 此日月輪，可令墮落；

src_original: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
